name: Verify Disabled Button Audio Feedback
description: Validates that disabled buttons provide appropriate audio feedback when the player attempts to interact with them.
testObjective: Ensure consistent audio feedback for invalid interactions with disabled buttons.
author: Dominic Brooks
preconditions: Player is in the ship room

steps.action: Press [E] while pointing at nothing in mid-air
steps.expected: A 'brrp' sound plays indicating invalid interaction

steps.action: Walk up to the disabled button next to the door
steps.expected: Button is visible and appears disabled

steps.action: Press [E] to interact with the disabled button
steps.expected: A 'brrp' sound plays indicating the button is disabled/invalid interaction
